verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> become <S%G4241><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%>:

That the aged men <S%G4246><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> sober <S%G3524><s%>, grave <S%G4586><s%>, temperate <S%G4998><s%>, sound <S%G5198><s%> in faith <S%G4102><s%>, in charity <S%G26><s%>, in patience <S%G5281><s%>.

The aged women <S%G4247><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%>, that they be in <S%G1722><s%> behaviour <S%G2688><s%> as becometh holiness <S%G2412><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> false accusers <S%G1228><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> given <S%G1402><s%> to much <S%G4183><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%>, teachers of good things <S%G2567><s%>;
That <S%G2443><s%> they may teach <S%G4994><s%> the young women <S%G3501><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> sober <S%G4994><s%>, to love their husbands <S%G5362><s%>, to love their children <S%G5388><s%>,

To be discreet <S%G4998><s%>, chaste <S%G53><s%>, keepers at home <S%G3626><s%>, good <S%G18><s%>, obedient <S%G5293><s%> to their own <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%>, that <S%G3363><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> be <S%G987><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> blasphemed <S%G987><s%>.
Young men <S%G3501><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> to be sober minded <S%G4993><s%>.

In <S%G4012><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> shewing <S%G3930><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> a pattern <S%G5179><s%> of good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>: in <S%G1722><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%> shewing uncorruptness <S%G90><s%>, gravity <S%G4587><s%>, sincerity <S%G861><s%>,

Sound <S%G5199><s%> speech <S%G3056><s%>, that cannot be condemned <S%G176><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> he that is of <S%G1537><s%> the contrary part <S%G1727><s%> may be ashamed <S%G1788><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%> thing <S%G3367><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>.

Exhort servants <S%G1401><s%> to be obedient <S%G5293><s%> unto their own <S%G2398><s%> masters <S%G1203><s%>, and to <S%G1511><s%> please them well <S%G2101><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things; not <S%G3361><s%> answering again <S%G483><s%>;

Not <S%G3361><s%> purloining <S%G3557><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> shewing <S%G1731><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> fidelity <S%G4102><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> they may adorn <S%G2885><s%> the doctrine <S%G1319><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> that bringeth salvation <S%G4992><s%> hath appeared <S%G2014><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>,

Teaching <S%G3811><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> that <S%G2443><s%>, denying <S%G720><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worldly <S%G2886><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%>, we should live <S%G2198><s%> soberly <S%G4996><s%> <S%G2532><s%>, righteously <S%G1346><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> godly <S%G2153><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> this present <S%G3568><s%> world <S%G165><s%>;

Looking for <S%G4327><s%> that blessed <S%G3107><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the glorious <S%G1391><s%> appearing <S%G2015><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

Who <S%G3739><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he might redeem <S%G3084><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> purify <S%G2511><s%> unto himself <S%G1438><s%> a peculiar <S%G4041><s%> people <S%G2992><s%>, zealous <S%G2207><s%> of good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>.

These things <S%G5023><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> rebuke <S%G1651><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> authority <S%G2003><s%>. Let <S%G4065><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> despise <S%G4065><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>.
